Question
========

Which statement about the multinomial logistic regression model is TRUE? 
Answerlist
----------
* The cumulative probability of an outcome. $Y \leq j$ is predicted.
* Only one regression coefficient is estimated in this model.
* This model is suitable only for unordered categorical outcome variables.
* The least squares method is used to estimate parameters.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
